T02TD2837E:179b-0: @179b * // 'phags pa padma'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2837E:179b-1: gang gi snying la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs rje'i gzhus bskyod byin rlabs kyi //
T02TD2837E:179b-2: mnga' rtse rnos bsnun yud tsam gang la nag po'i phyogs kyi rtsa lag dang //
T02TD2837E:179b-3: bdud kyi bu mo g-yo ba'i mig gis rnam kun blta bar mi nus pa'i //
T02TD2837E:179b-4: dpal gang bde chen rab tu 'bar byed 'khrul 'khor rgyal po la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2837E:179b-5: de nas 'phags pa thugs rje che //
T02TD2837E:179b-7: bya ba rang lus rtsa mchog gi //
T02TD2837E:179b-8: bu ga thog mar bsam par bya //
T02TD2837E:179b-9: rab dmar rdo rje rnon po'i 'od //
T02TD2837E:179b-10: khro zhing ha har bzhad pa'i nyams //
T02TD2837E:179b-11: thugs ka las brgyud ye shes mes //
T02TD2837E:179b-12: zhal bkang bdag don brtson pa po //
T02TD2837E:179b-13: lcags kyu padmo g-yas dang g-yon //
T02TD2837E:179b-14: brtul zhugs drag po rtsal 'gyed ba //
T02TD2837E:179b-15: gzhan gyis mi thub stobs po che //
T02TD2837E:179b-16: tshon gang bar ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD2837E:179b-17: lte bar ye shes sbar pa'i rlung //
T02TD2837E:179b-18: rtsibs brgyad gshog pa rno ldan dang //
T02TD2837E:179b-19: de dbus ri yig gis mtshan bcas //
T02TD2837E:179b-20: dh'u t'i yangs pa'i rkang zug pa'o //
T02TD2837E:179b-21: de dbus nas zhugs ye shes rlung //
T02TD2837E:179b-22: rab tu rdo rje'i rkang sogs can //
T02TD2837E:179b-24: bsdus shing grims par bzung ba yin //
T02TD2837E:179b-25: de lta bde gshegs snying po yi //
T02TD2837E:179b-26: sa bon yi ge h'um dkar 'khrigs //
T02TD2837E:179b-27: bltas te dgang ba'i rnal 'byor brtsam //
T02TD2837E:179b-28: sprul pa'i gnas kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02TD2837E:179b-29: rtsol ba'i rlung shugs 'dis bskyod pas //
T02TD2837E:179b-30: mgal me bskor ba ji bzhin du //
T02TD2837E:179b-33: de phyir ye shes shugs las kyang //
T02TD2837E:179b-34: me lce g-yo ba de bzhin du //
T02TD2837E:179b-35: de 'bar srog shing rlung gis kyang //
T02TD2837E:179b-36: thog med srog g-yo snying gar 'gyur //
T02TD2837E:179b-37: de tshe phem sgra dang bcas pas //
T02TD2837E:179b-38: sting nas lha yi bdud rtsi dbab //
T02TD2837E:179b-39: bde chen rab tu gsal ba'i dngos //
T02TD2837E:179b-41: gang tshe ye shes btung pa yi //
T02TD2837E:179b-42: chang gis myos par mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD2837E:179b-43: de tshe rang dbang med par ni //
T02TD2837E:180a-0: lus sems spro bas non par @180a * //
T02TD2837E:180a-2: dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor rdzogs so//
